Package de.hshannover.f4.trust.ifmapj.metadata

This package provides classes to handle standard IF-MAP metadata.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContentAuthorizationMetadataFactory
    Inteface to create the IF-MAP Metadata for Content Authorization this interface only implements the "ifmap-client-has-task Metadata Type", becaus it is necessary for the ICS Security Metadata
    IcsSecurityMetadataFactory
    Inteface to create the IF-MAP Metadata for ICS Security
    Metadata
    Interface for common IF-MAP metadata attributes.
    StandardIfmapMetadataFactory
    Inteface to create some of the standard metadata specified by IF-MAP 2.0.
    VendorSpecificMetadataFactory
    Interface for vendor-specific metadata factories.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContentAuthorizationMetadataFactoryImpl
    Simple implementation of the ContentAuthorizationMetadataFactory interface.
    IcsSecurityMetadataFactoryImpl
    Simple implementation of the IcsSecurityMetadataFactory interface.
    IfmapMetadataFactory
    Abstract base class for metadata factories.
    LocationInformation
    Entity class to hold location-information type and value fields.
    MetadataWrapper
    Factory for Metadata wrapper instances.
    StandardIfmapMetadataFactoryImpl
    Simple implementation of the StandardIfmapMetadataFactory interface.
    VendorSpecificMetadataFactoryImpl
    A implementation of the VendorSpecificMetadataFactory which wraps the creation of Documents.
    WlanSecurityType
    Entity class for the the wlan-security-type in an wlan-information element.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Cardinality
    Simple enum to express cardinality of IF-MAP metadata.
    EnforcementAction
    Possible values for the enforcement-action element within an enforcement-report.
    EventType
    Possible values for the type element within an event.
    Significance
    Possible values for the significance element within an event.
    WlanSecurityEnum
    Enum to express the standard wlan-security information.

Package de.hshannover.f4.trust.ifmapj.metadata Description

This package provides classes to handle standard IF-MAP metadata.
